name: Mercurial_Blow
display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow, dealing smashing damage and reducing the target's defense.

name: Mastery_of_Form
display_help: You are a living staff whose mastery of form is unique. You are able to boost your damage and chance to hit regularly.

name: Serpents_Reach
display_help: You release a burst of energy, causing smashing damage to a distant target. This burst of energy has a good chance of knocking your target to the ground.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown

name: Innocuous_Strikes
display_help: You batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of blows. This deals smashing damage to all enemies within a cone before you. This attack will also reduce your opponents' movement speed, with a chance of immobilizing them completely.
display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DoT(Smashing), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for Immobilize (Foe)

name: Sky_Splitter
display_help: You bash your opponent with a powerful overhead strike. This attack causes significant smashing damage and will knock your target off their feet. In extreme cases, your opponent will also be stunned. You will gain a buff to regeneration, recovery, damage and chance to hit.
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smashing), +RES(Self, All), +Regen(Self, All), +Rec(Self, All), +ToHit(Self), Knockdown(Foe), Chance to Stun(Foe)

name: Heal_Other
display_help: With a surge of positive energy, you heal a single target.

name: Blind
display_help: You create a brilliant flash which temporarily blinds your opponents, causing energy damage and freezing them in place. There is a chance that this flash will also briefly blind other opponents near to the main target.

name: Absorb_Pain
display_help: You unleash a burst of light which dramatically heals the wounds of a nearby entity. This entity may be friend or foe. The power of the heal dims you slightly, causing you damage and preventing any healing or regeneration on yourself for a while.
display_short_help: PBAoE (Single Target), Heal (Any), Moderate DMG (Self), -Regen(Self), +RES(Self, Heal)

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: You hurl large shards of ice at your opponents. These cause smashing damage on striking the target before chilling them, which causes cold damage and reduces both attack and movement speeds for a time.

name: Freeze_Ray
display_help: You fire a lance of supercooled ice at your target that causes the target to freeze upon impact. The affected target suffers cold damage and is held in place, unable to move.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: You create an ice storm around one of your opponents. This storm deals a constant stream of damage over a large area and can slow the movement of all opponents caught in its radius.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), -Rech(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All)

name: Scream
display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Howl
display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow

name: Shout
display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sonic_Barrier
display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Sonic_Dispersion
display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)

name: Blessing_of_Rejuvenation
display_help: The Counter Spell's Blessing of Rejuvenation constantly heals nearby allies.

name: Temporal_Mending
display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured, immediately healing them and continuing to do so for several seconds. Allies are also resistant to attack and movement speed debuffs for a short time.

name: Times_Juncture
display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl. Affected targets will see their movement speed, damage and chance to hit decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased.

name: Farsight
display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse into the future, providing them an increase in their perception, chance to hit and defenses.

name: Crush
display_help: You create a gravity well around a single target. This crushing well causes continual smashing damage and immobilizes the target. Flying targets are also brought to the ground.

name: Lift
display_help: You negate the force of gravity around your target, violently sending them into the air. This causes smashing damage when they fall to the ground.

name: Spectral_Wounds
display_help: You create spectral wounds on your target, which struggles with its grip on reality. This causes psionic damage and prevents the target from fleeing briefly, though some of this damage is not real and will be undone within a few seconds if the target survives.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Energy_Drain
display_help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Hit Points. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow

name: Siphon_Speed
display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long

name: Flares
display_help: You launch a small volley of flares at a single target, causing fire damage.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You launch a strong blast of fire at a target, causing fire damage. The target is set ablaze and suffers additional fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You launch a fireball at a targeted foe. This fireball explodes on reaching the target. Anyone caught in the radius of the explosion is burned and set ablaze.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Smashing/Fire), Moderate DoT(Fire)

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: You unleash a long range blast of darkness that causes negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You ensnare targets arrayed before you in a mass of tentacles pulled from the nether. These tentacles immobilize your foe and deal negative energy damage. The tentacles also continue to pummel your target, dealing smashing damage over time and reducing the target's chance to hit.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative Energy), Moderate DoT(Smashing), Immobilize(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)

name: Torrent
display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals negative energy damage and sends foes flying, while also reducing their chance to hit.

name: Life_Drain
display_help: You channel hidden knowledge to drain some life energy from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that drained life energy is transferred to you.

name: Gloom
display_help: You unleash a nebulous mass of darkness that slowly drains a target of life, causing negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Summon_Demonlings
display_help: You summon demons to assist you in battle.

name: Summon_Demon_Prince
display_help: You summon a demon prince to assist you in battle.

name: Hell_on_Earth
display_help: You improve a demon pet's damage and chance to hit. The pet is also wreathed in Living Hellfire, which will occasionally create beings of fire to attack your enemies.

name: Forge
display_help: You significantly enhance a single ally's damage potential and chance to hit.

name: Melt_Armor
display_help: You target a location and dramatically heat the air, melting any protections on targets caught within the area. Affected targets suffer reduced defense and resistance.

name: Cauterize
display_help: You cauterize the wounds of a targeted ally, healing them.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You launch a bolt of electrical energy at your foe, causing energy damage and draining the target's endurance. The target also has a chance to suffer reduced recovery.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: You fire a highly charged ball of electrical energy that erupts on hitting its target. This deals energy damage over time to all affected targets and drains some of their endurance. Targets may also suffer from a reduced recovery rate.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, High DMG(Energy), High DoT (Energy), -End(Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)

name: Jolting_Chain
display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, knocking each down and causing some energy damage. Affected targets also suffer endurance loss and may suffer suppressed recovery. The electric charge can jump to multiple opponents.
display_short_help: Ranged (Chain), Moderate DMG (Energy), -End(Foe), Knockdown(Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)

name: Damage_Fireball
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Cloud_of_Ice
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Lightning_Storm
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Ball_of_Light
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Animated_Staff
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Forbidden_Knowledge
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Crystal_Ball
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Time_Stop
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Vorpal_Sword
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Gate
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Dispel_Magic
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Counter_Spell
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Damage_Ward
display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

name: Lift
display_help: You negate the force of gravity around your target, violently sending them into the air. This causes smashing damage when they fall to the ground.

name: Time_Crawl
display_help: You dramatically slow time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed.

name: Distortion_Field
display_help: You slow the flow of time in a targeted area. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, -Rech(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for Hold(Foe)

name: Time_Stop
display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time, causing them to be held helpless and to suffer from reduced effectiveness of regeneration and healing. The hold is more severe if the target is Delayed by Time Crawl.

name: Chrono_Shift
display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly, allowing your allies to recover from battle and speed up their ability to fight back.

name: Propel
display_help: You open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object. You then launch this object at your target, causing smashing damage on impact and knocking the target back.

name: Hack
display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that deals lethal damage and reduces a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.

name: Spear_of_Light
display_help: You discharge a beam of energy, striking the target for energy damage.

name: Parry
display_help: You parry incoming attacks, dealing lethal damage. Additionally, you will increase your defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while.

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: You whirl around in a circle, slicing all foes in melee range for lethal damage. This attack also wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor lethal damage over time and reducing their defense.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All)

name: Disembowel
display_help: You perform a powerful disemboweling maneuver that deals a great amount of damage and can knock a target up into the air. This attack also reduces a target's defense.
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockup(Foe)

name: Head_Splitter
display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and reduces its Defense. The target may also be knocked to the ground.
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
